name: Falling To
description:
Falling To is a short retro horror game about making an uncomfortable choice. It can be completed in about 2 minutes.

DISCLAIMER

Players may find the following game unsettling.
There are no fullscreen jumpscares, but there are some sudden noises.

Some imagery may be unsettling or disturbing.

You may be forced to make an unfortunate choice.
You must accept how this plays out.

If you are not okay with this, please do not play the game.

If you are okay with this, press onwards.

(A similar disclaimer appears in-game.)

Additional content warnings for those who may need it (CONTAINS SPOILERS):

https://pastebin.com/JbczmYPv

Feel free to inform me of any more I should consider adding to the list if the disclaimer and additional warnings don't cover it already.
